item.title: HtH 3 Loadout Synergy
item.description: DISCLAIMER: PLEASE READ HtH 1 Loadouts Types & HtH 2 Loadout Creation BEFORE READING THIS DOCUMENT Hello Divers! This is Loadouts, explained. This document will show you how a mediocre Stratagem can become an extremely good Stratagem when paired with the right Loadout! _ Basic Synergy Many weapons usually fill out one role within the Loadout, with other Stratagems filling out the other roles that the weapon itself cannnot fill out.

item.title: HtH 2 Loadout Creation
item.description: DISCLAIMER: PLEASE READ HtH 1 Loadouts Types BEFORE READING THIS DOCUMENT Hello Divers! This is Loadouts, explained. This document will show you how you can use the several types of weaponry within our arsenal to make a Jack-of-all-Trades loadout or a specialised one! Loadout Creation - Basics Depending on which enemies youâ€™re facing, each type of weapon may be prioritised over others.

item.title: HtH 1 Loadouts Types
item.description: Hello Divers! This is Loadouts explained. This document will show you what types of weapons there are and in Part 2 will show you how to make a proper loadout.
